title: 3dPFM
description: Program for identifying brief BOLD events in fMRI time series using Paradigm Free Mapping

beta.title: Neuronal-related Time Series
beta.description: Prefix for the neuronal-related (i.e. deconvolved) time series.

betafitts.title: Convolved Neuronal-related Time Series
betafitts.description: Prefix of the convolved neuronal-related time series.

fitts.title: Fitted Time Series
fitts.description: Prefix for the fitted time series.

resid.title: Residuals
resid.description: Prefix for the residuals of the fit to the data.

mean.title: Intercept of the Model
mean.description: Prefix for the intercept of the model.

LHSest.title: LHS Parameter Estimates
LHSest.description: Prefix for the estimates of the LHS parameters.

LHSfitts.title: LHS Fitted Time Series
LHSfitts.description: Prefix for the fitted time series of the LHS parameters.

lambda.title: Regularization Parameter
lambda.description: Prefix for output volume with the regularization parameter of the deconvolution of each voxel.

costs.title: Cost Function Volume
costs.description: Prefix for output volume of the cost function used to select the regularization parameter according to the selected criteria.

Tstats_beta.title: T-statistics for Beta
Tstats_beta.description: Prefix for the T-statistics of beta at each time point.

Tdf_beta.title: Degrees of Freedom for T-statistics of Beta
Tdf_beta.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of the T-statistics of beta.

Z_Tstats_beta.title: Z-scores of T-statistics for Beta
Z_Tstats_beta.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the T-statistics of beta.

Fstats_beta.title: F-statistics for Beta
Fstats_beta.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the deconvolved component.

Fdf_beta.title: Degrees of Freedom for F-statistics of Beta
Fdf_beta.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_beta.

Z_Fstats_beta.title: Z-scores of F-statistics for Beta
Z_Fstats_beta.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the Fstats_beta.

Tstats_LHS.title: T-statistics for LHS Regressors
Tstats_LHS.description: Prefix for T-statistics of LHS regressors at each time point.

Tdf_LHS.title: Degrees of Freedom for T-statistics of LHS
Tdf_LHS.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of the Tstats_LHS.

Z_Tstats_LHS.title: Z-scores of T-statistics for LHS
Z_Tstats_LHS.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the Tstats_LHS.

Fstats_LHS.title: F-statistics for LHS Regressors
Fstats_LHS.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the LHS regressors.

Fdf_LHS.title: Degrees of Freedom for F-statistics of LHS
Fdf_LHS.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_LHS.

Fstats_full.title: F-statistics for Full Model
Fstats_full.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the full model.

Fdf_full.title: Degrees of Freedom for Full Model F-statistics
Fdf_full.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_full.

R2_full.title: R² of Full Model
R2_full.description: Prefix for R² (coefficient of determination) of the full model.

R2adj_full.title: R² Adjusted for Full Model
R2adj_full.description: Prefix for Adjusted R² coefficient for the full model.
